title: NCSA's Role in Web Development
description: The podcast highlighted NCSA's crucial role in the early days of web development. The adoption of NCSA mosaic, which later evolved into Apache, played a pivotal part in facilitating content creation and web server establishment worldwide. The openness of NCSA's tools contributed to the rapid growth of web servers and the availability of online content.
